title: Library Book Code Scanner
description: Library systems use book codes with specific formats: two uppercase letters followed by a hyphen, then exactly four digits, then another hyphen and two more uppercase letters. Find valid library book codes in the catalog system.
solutionSummary: Uses character class [A-Z] with exact quantifiers {2} and {4}, literal hyphens, and \d for digits. Demonstrates character classes with precise quantifiers for structured format validation.
